ApproxsimClient
Class HierarchyImportSet

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.HierarchyImportSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transferable
public class HierarchyImportSet
extends Object
implements Transferable

HierarchyImportSet is used to transfer objects that should keep their hierarchy to the simulation via drag and drop. It encapsulates a hierarcy of objects where only the 'selected' ones that are not already imported will be imported but where the hierarchy is kept intact for use in future imports. Also see HierarchyObjectAdapter.

transferToSimulation

public boolean transferToSimulation(ApproxsimObject root,
                                    double lat,
                                    double lon)
Transfers selected objects in the hierarcy to the simulation at the specified position.

Parameters:
root - the root where the simulation to transfer objects to lives.
lat - The latitude of the transfered objects.
lon - The longitude of the transfered objects.
Returns:
true if the transfer was succesful - false otherwise.
